text: 26 is a year in the 1st century. It was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Lentulus and Sabinus. == Events == * Pontius Pilate is appointed as Prefect of Judaea. * The Emperor Tiberius retires to Capri. He leaves the praetorian prefect Sejanus in charge of both Rome and the Empire. * Romans stop an uprising of Thracian tribesmen. == Deaths == * Claudia Pulchra, second cousin and close friend to Agrippina the elder. * Possible crucifixion of Jesus Category:20s
